005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
016
017import java.net.URI;
018import java.util.List;
019
020import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
022
023public final class FnStaticBaseUri {
024  private static final String NAME = "static-base-uri";
025  @NonNull
026  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
027      .name(NAME)
028      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
029      .deterministic()
030      .contextDependent()
031      .focusIndependent()
032      .argument(IArgument.builder()
033          .name("arg1")
034          .type(IStringItem.class)
035          .zeroOrOne()
036          .build())
037      .returnType(IAnyUriItem.class)
038      .returnOne()
039      .functionHandler(FnStaticBaseUri::execute)
040      .build();
041
042  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
043  @NonNull
044  private static ISequence<IAnyUriItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
045      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
046      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
047      IItem focus) {
048
049    IAnyUriItem uri = fnStaticBaseUri(dynamicContext);
050    return ISequence.of(uri);
051  }
052
053  private FnStaticBaseUri() {
054    // disable construction
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Get the static base URI from the static context.
059   *
060   * @param context
061   *          the dynamic context
062   * @return the base URI or {@code null} if none was set
063   */
064  @Nullable
065  public static IAnyUriItem fnStaticBaseUri(@NonNull DynamicContext context) {
066    URI staticBaseUri = context.getStaticContext().getBaseUri();
067
068    return staticBaseUri == null ? null : IAnyUriItem.valueOf(staticBaseUri);
069  }
070}
